boolean.label: Meshes in RAS
boolean.description: Whether the input meshes are already in the RAS(Right, Anterior, Superior) coordinate system (true) or in LPS (Left, Posterior, Superior) coordinate system (false, default). If not, it will be be internally transformed into RAS.
